#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int tests,n,count;
    char c[251],*p;
    scanf("%d",&tests);
    for(int i=0;i<tests;i++)
    {
            count=0;
            scanf("%s",c);
            n=strlen(c);
            p=c;
            while(*p)
            {
                     count=count+int(*p);
                     p++;
            }
            count=count/n;
            cout<<char(count)<<endl;
            }
            return 0;
            }
